definitions: A system that manages a rechargeable battery to ensure it operates within safe limits.
A computer-based control system installed in buildings that controls and monitors mechanical and electrical equipment.
A medical condition characterized by a chronic burning sensation in the mouth without an obvious cause.
examples: The electric vehicle's BMS prevented the cells from overheating.
The smart building uses a BMS to optimize energy consumption.
Patients with BMS often report a metallic taste.
